text: introducing the seven piece gardening tool set from work pro with six purpose-built hand tools a pair of gardening gloves and a convenient storage tote this set includes a transplanter with four inch depth engravings a trowel for digging a hand fork for aerating and mixing a weeder for precise weed removal a cultivator for loosening and spreading soil and a pair of pruning shears for trimming stems and small branches the hand tools feature comfortably contoured wooden handles for a comfortable grip and lanyard loops for additional storage options built to last with quality components these tools are sure to serve any gardener well for years to come work pro build a better project
